title: Shoey Culture
description: Katie and the Union discuss things they hate for irrational reasons. Friendly banter includes Below Deck JV (9:50), brunch (20:35) and listening to songs you don’t like (37:10). Sorry England, it’s not coming home (49:20). Before there was Shohai Ohtani…there was Katie Nolan (1:13:05). Greg Hardy got knocked out and stop replaying injuries (1:20:31). Is Addison Rae a UFC reporter (1:47:48)? Nerds can also be jocks (2:03:38). Finally, what athletes would you want to room with in college (2:15:25)?
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and the Union discuss the Euro Final, Addison Rae, injuries & more
